<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.finance" name="Finance Service Management" state="published" help="Finance_Service_Management" version="1.0.0" onload_demo_data="load_demo_data.js" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="true" license_model="mixed">
<requires> <import plugin="com.snc.service_management.core" /> </requires>
<description>Manages finance requests and enables users to report and track those requests. Activation of this plugin on production instances may require a separate license. Contact ServiceNow for details. </description> </plugin>
]]></definition> <description>Manages finance requests and enables users to report and track those requests. Activation of this plugin on production instances may require a separate license. Contact ServiceNow for details.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Finance_Service_Management</help> <id>com.snc.finance_service_automation</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Finance Service Management</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.finance_service_automation/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.service_management.core</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>m.snc.finance_service_automation</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
